description: Meaning a troublemaker who brings chaos or discord, someone who disturbs others.

examples.chinese: 这帮小孩儿太能闹腾了,一群搅屎棍
examples.translation: These kids are too noisy, a bunch of shit stirrers

examples.chinese: 领导休假半个月,搅屎棍不在之后工作效率up
examples.translation: Leader is on vacation for half a month, work efficiency up since the shit stirrer is gone

examples.chinese: 家暴的爸,抑郁症的妈,搅屎棍的弟弟,不想回家
examples.translation: Domestic violence dad, depressed mom, shit stirrer brother, don't want to go home
